description: Scientifically-based look at trends in energy availability, emission control and regulation, and technological advances to make an assessment of the future of engines and powertrain systems for vehicles throughout the world. Emphasis on trends for sustainable mobility solutions.

optimized_prerequisites.prerequisites_text: Graduate/professional standing, declared in Capstone Certificate in Engine Design, or declared in Capstone Certificate in Powertrain Electrification

prerequisites.prerequisites_text: Graduate/professional standing, declared in Capstone Certificate in Engine Design, or declared in Capstone Certificate in Powertrain Electrification
